@graph.name: Carrot, Leek, Parsnip Soup
@graph.description: This Carrot, Leek, Parsnip soup, is quick and easy and packed full of flavor. A warming and comforting vegan and gluten free recipe
recipeIngredient: freshly ground black pepper or red pepper flakes to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat oil at medium heat and add leeks to it.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, heat oil at medium heat and add leeks to it.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the carrots and parsnip and cook covered for 2-3 minutes until parnips start to get tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the carrots and parsnip and cook covered for 2-3 minutes until parnips start to get tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend these with 1/2 cup or more water into a puree and pour puree back into the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend these with 1/2 cup or more water into a puree and pour puree back into the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add salt, cajun spice and freshly ground black pepper to taste, mix well and bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add salt, cajun spice and freshly ground black pepper to taste, mix well and bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust, salt spices and water content.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust, salt spices and water content.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with parsley or cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with parsley or cilantro.

@graph.keywords: easy vegan soup, quick recipe, root vegetable soup
